snippet: Three people were shot to death and one was critically wounded on Tuesday at a house in suburban Salt Lake City where drug activity was suspected, officials said.
abstract: Three people are shot to death, and one is critically wounded, during shootout at Salt Lake City house where drug activity was suspected.
lead_paragraph: Three people were shot to death and one was critically wounded on Tuesday at a house in suburban Salt Lake City where drug activity was suspected, officials said.

headline.main: Utah: 3 Killed in Suspected Drug House
headline.print_headline: Utah: 3 Killed In Suspected Drug House
